headers.description: Client request headers to match on.

method.description: Client request header method to match on. Valid values: `GET`, `HEAD`, `POST`, `PUT`, `DELETE`, `CONNECT`, `OPTIONS`, `TRACE`, `PATCH`.

path.description: Client request path to match on.

port.description: The port number to match from the request.

prefix.description: Header value sent by the client must begin with the specified characters.

queryParameters.description: Client request query parameters to match on.

scheme.description: Client request header scheme to match on. Valid values: `http`, `https`.
